verbose_text: For the second line (Mrgprd-ChR2), we crossed an inducible Cre mouse line generated in our lab Mrgprd CreERT2, to Ai32 in which ChR2 is specifically expressed in non peptidergic MRGPRD+ C-nociceptors (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY; ~ 20%-25% of DRG neurons in total).
evidence: Ai32 in which ChR2 is specifically expressed
